Property.Description:
Fully Furnished Carmel Mountain Ranch Home! - FULLY furnished, corporate rental style. Air conditioned single story, beautifully furnished and upgraded in the Walden home community. This home features natural real maple hardwood floors throughout with exception of modern tile in bathrooms, updated modern kitchen with Caesar stone Quartz countertops and sit-at island with overhanging pendant lighting, stainless steel appliances including built-in frig-freezer, microwave, and Miele coffee maker. Also modern smooth counter cooktop, built-in oven and 2-drawer dishwasher that all match white quartz countertops. Additional kitchen features include filtered water to sink and coffee maker, custom glass tile backsplash, custom cabinetry with easy-glide, auto-closing drawers and corner cabinet with slide-out lazy-Susan. The large living room and formal dining room combination has vaulted ceilings and the family room has gas fireplace, built-in entertainment center, custom shades, ceiling fan 50" flat-screen TV and access to large patio and fenced yard. The master bedroom suite features vaulted ceiling, large walk-in closet with built-in closet system, access to patio and yard, and the master bath has granite dual-sink vanity, a shower for two with dual showerheads, separate jetted spa tub. The hall bath has pedestal sink with dark wood cabinet and tub-shower combination and laundry room includes full-size washer and dryer. Other features throughout the home include dual pane windows and doors, recessed lighting, and plantation shutters. Two-car garage is attached and has epoxy floor. Home is close to elementary school, shopping centers, and has quick easy freeway access from 15 and 56. Pets- 2 max- 25lbs each.

Property.Description:
San Miguel Ranch Home with Bonus Room/Den and Built-in Office Area - Built in 2004 with nearly 2500sf, this beautiful home on a cul-de-sac street has a spacious bonus room with glass-panel French doors and full bath on first floor, built-in office area off of second floor hallway, attached 2-car garage, large back patio and fenced grassy backyard overlooking open canyon, tropical front yard, automatic lawn sprinklers in front and back, and nice storage shed. Other interior features are ceramic tile throughout first floor, white tile counter tops and oak cabinetry in spacious kitchen including large triple-door pantry and black appliances including refrigerator, gas-range/oven, dishwasher and built-in microwave, large living room with fireplace and wall niche for your entertainment center, and dining area between living room and kitchen. Second floor has neutral carpet in bedrooms and hallways with tiled baths, and features include the built-in office area, an extra-large Master Bedroom and spacious Master Bath with elongated dual-sink vanity area, garden tub and separate shower enclosure, plus a big walk-in closet. Additional bedrooms are nicely sized and hall bath has a tub/shower combination and toilet in separate room from dual-sink vanity room. Laundry room is adjacent to 2-car attached garage and includes a full-size washer and dryer. All utilities are responsibility of tenants. Two cats allowed, no dogs please!
CA BRE 01197438
(RLNE2579848)

Property.Description:
Gorgeous Point Loma Home! - Enjoy the gorgeous view and ocean breeze!!! To the left of the foyer is the living room with a corner brick fireplace were you can sit and relax to enjoy the amazing view this home has from the living room you can access the formal dining room, kitchen and the family dining room with lots of storage capabilities. Adjacent to the family dining room there is a hallway that leads to the garage and the partially covered patio area that has custom built-in benchs along the half-glass wall looking out to the sea. Down the hall is the laundry area and opposite that wall is a floor to ceiling linen cabinet. about mid-way there is a flight of stairs leading down to a large one bedroom granny flat with its own entry private entry, a brick fireplace, kitchen area bathroom and bedroom. Come back up the stairs and further along the hallway heading toward the foyer is another hallway to the left leading to the master bedroom and the rest of the house. You can marvel at the views from the master bedroom as well as the grannyflat . CA BRE 01197438

Property.Description:
Beautifully Upgraded Stone Ridge Home! AVAILABLE 10/24/2016! - Come live in this completely upgraded home in the gated community of Stone Ridge. The minute you pull up to this home and see the community you will know this is the home where you want to live.
When you walk into this home you will get a smile on your face. The entry has high ceilings, travertine tile accented by custom color paint. On the right is the formal living room. You then pass the grand staircase leading to the 2nd floor and enter the formal dining room on the right. To the left is the laundry room and the 1/2 bath that is upgraded with travertine tile and granite counter tops.
Continue on to the highly upgraded kitchen which boasts travertine tile, distressed look cabinetry accented by granite counter tops and stove-top island. Stainless steel appliances. Small eat-in dining room. Off the kitchen is a den boasting travertine tile and fireplace. Step out into a great entertaining space with a private pool and spa. Amazing scenic views. Back yard also includes pergola which covers the built-in bar-be-que, refrigerator and stone fireplace. Small dog run off to the side of the house.
The staircase leads to a highly upgraded 2nd floor. When you walk up the stairs there are plenty of windows to let in the natural light along with decorative spaces/nooks. The master suite is amazing with several windows letting in natural light which exude a great view. His and hers walk-in closets lead to the master on-suite. His and hers granite topped vanities, one on each side of the room. Large jacuzzi tub and separate shower.
2nd floor also entertains an office space with built-in cabinetry. 2 spare bedrooms which boast wood flooring, custom paint and ceiling fans. Throughout the home you will see other upgrades such as recessed lighting, custom color paint, custom baseboards and crown molding. Each aspect adds to the uniqueness of the beautiful home. 2 car attached garage with storage space. Pool service and landscaper included in rent. Pets ok with additional deposit and rent.
(RLNE2623976)
Property.Amenity: private spa, private gated community, vaulted ceiling, granite countertops, hardwood and tile flooring, built-in bbq

Property.Description:
Gorgeous North Clairemont Town-home!! - Updated and open two story town home in North Clairemont! This gorgeous unit features an updated kitchen with all stainless appliances, gas fireplace, and a total of three balconies! Both bedrooms are on the second level. The master bedroom features gorgeous vaulted ceilings, on suite balcony and bathroom. The bathroom features dual vanities, spacious mirrored closets, and a separated toilet and shower area. Sit in the open living room and enjoy the comfort of the gas fireplace. Enjoy the convenience of a two car garage and your own private washer and dryer. The community features a pool, spa, guest parking and open street parking. This unit offers the benefits of being in a quiet, well kept community while still being within minutes of everything beautiful San Diego has to offer! Schedule your tour today! Will consider one pet under 25 lbs
